attributes.action: Call for a national enquiry into the Grooming/rape gangs in towns across Britain
attributes.additional_details: We need action from an independent inquiry so that any coverup of this harrowing situation can be brought into the public domain and any government bodies or institutions who have been complicit will be named, shamed and brought to justice. This has to stop!
attributes.background: We need an urgent National enquiry to uncover the disgraceful neglect on behalf of government officials, police, social care etc that has allowed the rape gangs to ruin the lives of young British Girls.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
